summary: I SUBMITTED A REQUEST FOR REIMBURSEMENT FOR THE CLOCK SPRING REPAIR (SAFETY RECALL) IN MY THEN 1996 DODGE CARAVAN ON JANUARY 28, 2003.  I HAVE NOT HEARD FROM DAIMLER CHRYSLER SINCE.  I HAVE TELEPHONED AND SENT THEM A SECOND LETTER REQUESTING REIMBURSEMENT BUT AGAIN HAVE NOT HEARD FROM THEM.  I AM DISAPPOINTED AND FRUSTRATED THAT THEY TAKE THIS POSITION.  WHAT CAN I DO TO GET THEIR ATTENTION.   *NLM
